auth.REGISTRATION_SUCCESS: Registration successful. Please check your email for verification.
auth.REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_EMAIL_DELAYED: Registration successful. Confirmation email may be delayed.
auth.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: This email address is already registered
auth.PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION_MISMATCH: Password and confirmation password do not match
auth.PASSWORD_POLICY_VIOLATION: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
auth.ACCOUNT_LOCKED: Account temporarily locked due to multiple failed attempts
auth.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many login attempts. Please try again in 15 minutes
auth.SESSION_EXPIRED: Session has expired. Please login again
auth.EXPIRED_RESET_TOKEN: Reset link has expired. Please request a new one
auth.PASSWORD_RESET_LINK_SENT: Reset link sent to your email
auth.TOO_MANY_VERIFICATION_ATTEMPTS: Too many verification attempts. Please try again later
auth.ACCOUNT_DEACTIVATED: Account has been deactivated. Please contact your administrator.
auth.PASSWORD_RESET_REQUIRED: Your password has been reset. Please set a new password to continue.

validation.INVALID_INPUT: The provided data does not meet business requirements
validation.COMPANY_NAME_LENGTH: Company name must be between 2 and 200 characters

errors.LOGIN_TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE: Login temporarily unavailable. Please try again later
errors.VERIFICATION_TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE: Email verification temporarily unavailable. Please try again later
errors.TENANT_SUSPENDED: Your organization account has been suspended. Please contact support.
errors.TENANT_INACTIVE: Your organization account is inactive. Please contact support.

business.REGISTRATION_TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE: Registration temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

email.VERIFICATION_THANK_YOU: Thank you for registering with Samanin. To complete your registration, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:
email.VERIFICATION_ALTERNATIVE_TEXT: If the button doesn't work, you can copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.VERIFICATION_EXPIRY_NOTE: This verification link will expire in 24 hours.
email.VERIFICATION_IGNORE_NOTE: If you didn't create an account with us, please ignore this email.
email.RESET_DESCRIPTION: We received a request to reset your password for your Samanin account. If you made this request, click the button below to reset your password:
email.RESET_ALTERNATIVE_TEXT: If the button doesn't work, you can copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.RESET_EXPIRY_NOTE: This password reset link will expire in 2 hours
email.RESET_SINGLE_USE_NOTE: You can only use this link once
email.RESET_IGNORE_NOTE: If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email
email.RESET_SECURITY_TITLE: For security reasons, we recommend creating a strong password that includes:
email.RESET_SUPPORT_NOTE: If you have questions, please contact our support team.
email.ADMIN_RESET_SUBJECT: Your Samanin Password Has Been Reset
email.ADMIN_RESET_NOTIFICATION: Your Samanin account password has been reset by an administrator.
email.ADMIN_RESET_LOGIN_INSTRUCTIONS: Please log in using this temporary password and change it immediately for security.
email.ADMIN_RESET_CHANGE_PASSWORD_NOTE: You will be required to change your password on your next login.
email.ADMIN_RESET_LINK_DESCRIPTION: Click the button below to reset your password:
email.ADMIN_RESET_EXPIRY_NOTE: This reset link will expire in 24 hours.
email.ADMIN_RESET_SECURITY_NOTE: If you did not request this password reset, please contact your administrator immediately.
email.DEACTIVATION_NOTIFICATION: Your account has been deactivated by an administrator.
email.REACTIVATION_NOTIFICATION: Your account has been reactivated and you now have full access to the system.
email.DEACTIVATION_CONSEQUENCES:
As a result of this change:
• You will no longer be able to log in to the system
• All your active sessions have been terminated
• Your data and history remain preserved
email.REACTIVATION_NEXT_STEPS:
You can now:
• Log in to the system using your existing credentials
• Access all features according to your role
• Continue where you left off
email.STATUS_CHANGE_CONTACT_SUPPORT: If you have any questions about this change, please contact your administrator or support team.
email.STATUS_CHANGE_FOOTER: This is an automated notification from the Samanin Rental Management System.
email.PROFILE_UPDATE_SUBJECT: Your Samanin Profile Has Been Updated
email.PROFILE_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION: Your Samanin account profile has been updated by an administrator.
email.PROFILE_UPDATE_ROLE_CHANGED: Your role has been changed to: {newRole}
email.PROFILE_UPDATE_STATUS_CHANGED: Your account status has been changed to: {newStatus}
email.PROFILE_UPDATE_CONTACT_SUPPORT: If you have questions about these changes, please contact your organization administrator or our support team.
email.WELCOME_SUBJECT: Welcome to Samanin - Your Account is Ready
email.WELCOME_ACCOUNT_CREATED: Your account has been successfully created by your organization administrator.
email.WELCOME_LOGIN_INSTRUCTIONS: You can now log in to your Samanin account using the credentials below:
email.WELCOME_CHANGE_PASSWORD_NOTE: For security reasons, we recommend changing your password after your first login.
email.WELCOME_SUPPORT_NOTE: If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact your administrator or our support team.

dashboard.TENANT_INACTIVE: Account temporarily unavailable. Please contact support for assistance.
dashboard.ACCESS_DENIED: Access denied. Please login to continue.
dashboard.DATA_ERROR: Unable to load dashboard data. Please try again later.

locale.FORMATTING_CONFIG_ERROR: Unable to retrieve locale formatting configuration. Please try again later.

users.INVALID_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT: Invalid role assignment. Please select a valid role.
users.INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: You do not have permission to create users
users.ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_RESTRICTED: You do not have permission to assign this role
users.INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER_FORMAT: Please provide a valid phone number in international format
users.WELCOME_EMAIL_FAILED: User created successfully, but welcome email could not be sent
users.USER_UPDATE_FAILED: Failed to update user profile. Please try again later.
users.CANNOT_EDIT_HIGHER_PRIVILEGE_USER: You cannot edit users with higher privileges
users.CANNOT_MODIFY_OWN_ROLE: You cannot modify your own role assignment
users.CANNOT_MODIFY_OWN_STATUS: You cannot modify your own account status
users.USER_STATUS_CHANGED: User account status has been changed
users.USER_ROLE_CHANGED: User role assignment has been changed
users.NO_CHANGES_DETECTED: No changes were detected in the submitted data
users.PASSWORD_RESET_FAILED: Failed to reset password. Please try again later.
users.PASSWORD_RESET_EMAIL_FAILED: Password reset initiated, but notification email could not be sent
users.PASSWORD_RESET_RATE_LIMITED: Too many password reset attempts. Please try again later.
users.PASSWORD_RESET_SELF_ATTEMPT: You cannot reset your own password using this function. Please use the self-service password change option.
users.PASSWORD_RESET_USER_DEACTIVATED: Cannot reset password for deactivated user account
users.PASSWORD_RESET_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: You do not have permission to reset passwords for this user
users.PROFILE_UPDATE_FAILED: Failed to update profile. Please try again later.
users.PASSWORD_CHANGE_FAILED: Failed to change password. Please try again later.
users.SESSION_TERMINATION_FAILED: Failed to terminate session. Please try again later.
users.SESSION_NOT_FOUND: Session not found or already terminated
users.CANNOT_TERMINATE_CURRENT_SESSION: Cannot terminate your current active session
users.ACTIVITY_RETRIEVAL_FAILED: Failed to retrieve account activity. Please try again later.
users.USER_STATUS_CHANGE_FAILED: Failed to change user status. Please try again later.
users.BULK_STATUS_CHANGE_FAILED: Failed to complete bulk status change. Please try again later.
users.CANNOT_DEACTIVATE_SELF: You cannot deactivate your own account. Please contact another administrator.
users.CANNOT_DEACTIVATE_LAST_ADMIN: Cannot deactivate the last active administrator. At least one administrator must remain active.
users.INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS_STATUS_CHANGE: You do not have permission to change the status of this user.
users.USER_HAS_ACTIVE_OPERATIONS: This user has active operations that must be completed or transferred before deactivation.
users.INVALID_STATUS_TRANSITION: Invalid status transition. The requested status change is not allowed.
users.BULK_OPERATION_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Bulk operation limit exceeded. Maximum 50 users can be processed at once.
users.STATUS_CHANGE_NOTIFICATION_FAILED: Status changed successfully, but notification email could not be sent.
users.SESSION_TERMINATION_PARTIAL_FAILURE: Status changed successfully, but some user sessions could not be terminated.
